ProductInfo.Features:
8 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial DVR, 2000GB SATA hard drive included. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Support the live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network. Support iPhone Google Phone
Support daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function. CIF: 200fps/8ch
Package included: 8 CH standalone DVR, 2 TB hard drive, power supply, USB mouse, user manual and software
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV 8 Channel H.264 Video DVR Stand Alone Real Time Digital Video Recorder Supports Network Remote View iPhone Google Phone with 2000GB Hard Drive WD9
